# Cybercrime Portal - GitHub Repository

This repository contains the complete Decentralized Cybercrime Reporting Portal.

## Repository Structure

- `frontend/` - Next.js 14 application
- `backend/` - Express API server
- `blockchain/` - Hardhat smart contracts

## Setup Instructions

See `START_HERE.md` in the root directory.

## Contributing

1. Fork the repository
2. Create a feature branch
3. Make your changes
4. Submit a pull request
